text.name: fl_choose_duration
text.text: Choose the deal length in years

text.name: fl_choose_option
text.text: Choose which option to purchase with

text.name: fl_not_enough_money_deposit
text.text: You need at least %s deposit to hire purchase this item.

text.name: fl_deal_complete
text.text: Your hire purchase deal for %s has finished.

text.name: fl_deal_complete_early
text.text: Your hire purchase deal was settled because you sold the vehicle.

text.name: fl_disclaimer_line_one
text.text: * Payments will be collected automatically and may put you in to arrears.

text.name: fl_disclaimer_line_two
text.text: ** If you sell the item before the hire purchase deal is complete, you will pay the full outstanding amount.

text.name: fl_disclaimer_line_three
text.text: *** The deposit will be taken immediately. Monthly payments begin next month. The final fee is due the month after the last monthly payment.

text.name: fl_not_enough_money_settlement
text.text: You don't have enough money to settle this deal.

text.name: fl_deal_not_found
text.text: The deal could not be found. It may have already been settled.
